ast.name: EDH lifecounter (MTG)
ast.comment: Lifecounter for Elder Dragon Highlander (aka Commander) multiplayer games of Magic the Gathering. Portrait issues fixed now.

body.text: Swipe the beads to increment/decrement life totals. Double tap to enter new life total value for a player. Drag beads on top of other beads to increase recorded damage done by the corresponding commanders. Tap target bead then drag corresponding commander's bead on top of it to enter new damage value to record. Rotate phone face down for a new game. Also I advise to start the script with the phone in portrait layout. Afterwards feel free to rotate it, as the script should adapt to it.

app.comment: Lifecounter for Elder Highlander Dragon (aka Commander) multiplayer games of Magic the Gathering
